Release Notes 1.3.1

New Features

  • Mouse Activation: New option in settings to activate tab bar by moving mouse to screen edge
  • Tab Bar Visual Improvements:
    • Added glow effect around tab bar for better contrast on dark backgrounds
    • Improved tab bar dismissal animations
  • Enhanced Settings:
    • Added ability to deactivate license key
    • Improved license view interface
  • Improved Onboarding: Added new screens to help users get started

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed crashes affecting some users
  • Improved Firefox tab tracking reliability
  • Enhanced VSCode split view tab tracking
  • Fixed low resolution center Tab Bar on certain monitors
  • Improved CMD+Q reliability
  • Fixed missing apps in settings app list
